none: THUP - In The Wake Of A Collapsing Star
In The Wake Of A Collapsing Star
THUP - In The Wake Of A Collapsing Star

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on August 16, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Darkness abounds on the seventh offering from THUP, In The Wake Of A Collapsing Star. Too intentional to be dismissed as damaged, this duo's ability to manipulate noise scapes is deadly, and their mission is focused. The sound of living in and through the silent horror biopic of your own terrifying existence, and evidence that the film is already in production. You're the collapsing star...it's your time to shine.IN THE WAKE OF A COLLAPSING STAR
https://thup.bandcamp.com/music
